title: Samuel Leads Israel to Victory
summary: 1 Samuel 7 describes Israel’s return to God under Samuel’s leadership. The people repent and remove idols. God helps them defeat the Philistines at Mizpah, and peace returns for a time.

faq.question: What did Samuel tell the people to do?
faq.answer: To return to God wholeheartedly, put away idols, and serve Him alone.

faq.question: How did God help Israel defeat the Philistines?
faq.answer: He thundered loudly, throwing the enemy into confusion and giving Israel victory.
